articles.title: About me
articles.contents:
Dynamic and proactive individual seeking for challenging opportunities in area of Data Science. Eager to contribute to the team project with my knowledge in Machine learning, Python and R coding skills. A person who strongly believes in making a difference in society with the help of technology.
Objective
To secure a position where I can efficiently contribute my skills and abilities to the growth of the organization and build my professional career.
Education
St.Clair College | Windsor, CAN
Data Analytics for Business | 2020 - 2021
Parul Institute of Engg. & Technology | Vadodara, IND
Bachelors in Computer Engineering | 2014 - 2018
Jay Ambe Vidhyabhavan, Bardoli | Bardoli, IND
XIIth (G.S.E.B) | 2012 - 2014
Experience
Grafiks Point | Associate Software Engineer | August 2018 - March 2021
I have worked for the Banking-Insurance project in Grafiks Point, where my role was to develop a web application for the client and automate the existing processes using robotic process automation. I got a chance to interact with Core Java, advanced java Hibernate. Moreover, on the database side, we used PL/SQL database. Moreover, I have interacted with UI Path Studio for the automation of the daily repetitive processes.
Area of expertise
Self-motivated individual and capable of delivering high performance
Detail and accuracy oriented
Ability to work alone as well as in Team
Coordination and Organization
Punctual and reliable
